name: bespoke-title
description: Automatically sets the document title to match the title of the active slide in a Bespoke.js presentation.
readme:
# bespoke-title

Automatically sets the document title to match the title of the active slide in a [Bespoke.js](http://markdalgleish.com/projects/bespoke.js) presentation.

## Usage

This plugin is shipped in a [UMD format](https://github.com/umdjs/umd), meaning it is available as a CommonJS/AMD module or as a browser global.

For example, when using CommonJS modules:

```js
var bespoke = require('bespoke'),
  title = require('bespoke-title');

bespoke.from('.deck', [
  title()
]);
```

When using browser globals:

```js
bespoke.from('.deck', [
  bespoke.plugins.title()
]);
```

For more information about options and how the plugin works, see the [complete README](https://github.com/opendevise/bespoke-title/blob/master/README.adoc).
